category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: MEAlignmentCheckReportDefinition
preference.preference_description: Contains the name of the report definition that controls the creation of the EBOM-MBOM alignment check report. A default report definition is provided but you can supply a custom report definition if necessary. Valid Values: A single character string that contains the name of an existing report definition object.
